item.title: Multinary for Lute
item.description: A simple webserver that displays multiple dictionaries on one page. It’s written in go. Read more on github.com

item.title: Cardio For Anki
item.description: Cardio is a flashcard creation tool, I wrote in golang with a declarative gui library called GIO. Read more on github.com

item.title: Chip8 Emulator
item.description: Written in c++ and SDL2. Source

item.title: Small Bugs Are Hard To See
item.description: Take a look at the following code. #include <iostream> #include <string> int main() { int number_integer = -1; std::string number_string = "11"; number_integer = std::stoi(number_string); std::cout << "The number is " << number_integer; number_string = "ll" ; number_integer = std::stoi(number_string); std::cout << "The has changed to " << number_integer; }
